item.title: linux commands
item.description: ssh # # specify port ssh -p 2200 scp # sshpass #

item.title: linux notes
item.description: init system # Ubuntu: use Systemd as default since 15.04 use upstart before # check init system used if which systemctl &>/dev/null then echo "init system: systemd" elif [[ "`ps -p1 | grep systemd && echo systemd || echo upstart`" = "upstart" ]] then echo "init system: upstart" else echo "init system not supported (upstart and systemd supported)" exit 1 fi systemd # upstart # description "my-app" respawn console output chdir ${app-dir} exec ${app-dir}/my-app --port=${port}
